summary: React 185 infinite loop error testing - CRITICAL ISSUE: Fix is incomplete, error persists in CommandRail component

ui_bugs.issue: React 185 infinite loop error still occurring - Maximum update depth exceeded
ui_bugs.details: The fix applied to QuickActions component did not resolve the core issue. CommandRail component is still causing infinite re-renders during page refresh and navigation.
ui_bugs.error_message: Maximum update depth exceeded. This can happen when a component repeatedly calls setState inside componentWillUpdate or componentDidUpdate. React limits the number of nested updates to prevent infinite loops.

integration_issues.issue: React 185 error triggers during page refresh and tab switching
integration_issues.details: While basic tab navigation works initially, page refresh triggers the infinite loop error in CommandRail component

passed_tests: Basic tab navigation (History, War, Insights) works initially

success_percentage.frontend: 30% - Basic functionality works but critical React 185 error persists

issues.problem: Still causing React 185 infinite loop error despite QuickActions fix
issues.recommendation: Apply same useShallow pattern fix to CommandRail component's store subscriptions
issues.details: The CommandRail component is subscribing to store selectors that are causing infinite re-renders. Need to apply the same individual subscription pattern used in QuickActions fix.

issues.problem: Incomplete fix - other components may have same issue
issues.recommendation: Audit ALL components using dashboard store subscriptions for similar patterns
issues.details: The fix was only applied to QuickActions but the same destructuring/subscription pattern likely exists in other components. Need comprehensive audit of all store usage.

immediate_actions: Fix CommandRail component store subscriptions using useShallow pattern
Audit all other components using useDashboardStore for similar issues
Test page refresh scenarios specifically as this triggers the error
Consider temporarily disabling CommandRail if fix is complex
